GSD.product_version: versions from v4.11 to before v5.10.156
GSD.description:
serial: 8250: omap: Fix unpaired pm_runtime_put_sync() in omap8250_remove()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.156 by commit d833cba201adf9237168e19f0d76e4d7aa69f303, it was introduced in version v4.11 by commit 4e0f5cc65098ea32a1e77baae74215b9bd5276b1. For more details please see the references link.
